title: Dual active pyrimidine-based carbocyclic nucleoside derivatives: synthesis, and in silico and in vitro anti-diabetic and anti-microbial studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9559-9569
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00304G, Paper

Kalyani Mallidi, Rambabu Gundla, Parameshwar Makam, Naresh Kumar Katari, Sreekantha Babu Jonnalagadda
New pyrimidine-based carbocylic nucleoside derivatives with C-4 substitution for inhibiting α-glucosidase as a means of alleviating the effects of diabetes mellitus (DM) and microbial infections.
